welcome_message_body: Welcome to Wangzhuang, a charming city known for its beautiful gardens, rich history, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Nanyuan Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beijing Daxing International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Beijing Daxing International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport. Users need to register with a valid phone number to access the network.
